2106620.name: A Tale of Saviors: Garuda Academy
2106620.description:
A Tale of Saviors: Garuda Academy is a 2D turn-based RPG with narrative storytelling. Set in a modern world 10 years after the mystic beast war.

The world story

Ten years after a mysterious gate appeared over the world and monsters appeared in the human world called the mystic beast. Their appearance only brings chaos and destruction. After that, all countries agreed to establish an organization called SAVIORS which is gathering all mystic power users all over the world and with this the mystic beast war began. With immeasurable sacrifices and they succeed to end the war. Even so, the SAVIORS are still preparing for the worst thing, which is that 10 years ago happened again. Therefore SAVIOR prepares young people with talents and has the power of the Mystic Arms gathered in one place, namely the academy developed by SAVIORS. One of them is Garuda Academy which is in the republic of Aethos.

Game Features:



Emphasizes the importance of using strategy and making informed decisions in a turn-based battle system in order to triumph over obstacles and difficulties. Players are encouraged to take full advantage of the mechanics of the turn-based system to achieve success in their battles.


By introducing the cooldown feature for skills, players cannot spam their strongest skills, but must carefully consider their actions and choose effective skills to use at the right time. This can add challenge to each battle, and players must plan their next move carefully to win.


Every time you level up you will get bonus points to strengthen your character by distributing them. It should be noted that the points that can be distributed can be rearranged if they are not as desired and do not match the situation in the game.


If you want more skills, you can buy a mystic crest (magic) for your journey to defeat enemies.


No more random encounter battles.


Collect materials from mystic beasts, shopping, etc. to craft your items through the crafting system, This is to save you money and some of them are very useful.
